segments.text: What a scene, it's just a cascade of potential messes and misunderstandings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is wide open, water just keeps pouring out, it's relentless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't looked down or heard the splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem is likely soaked already, not to mention her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making me angry to see such a waste of water and impending damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And then the children, completely focused on their cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is practically asking to tip over, it's so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re just moments away from a potential fall and a broken jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one is paying attention to what truly needs their focus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the garden only highlights the internal chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to intervene, to point out the obvious hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is definitely going to lead to a big clean-up job.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a peculiar tableau of domestic life, caught in a moment of utter distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR
